alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:57AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradley, south central Cleveland, Calhoun, southeastern Dallas, Ouachita and southwestern Drew Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 656 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harlow to 6 miles north of Stephens. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Camden... Warren... Fordyce... Hampton... Bearden... Stephens... Hermitage... Calion... Thornton... Harrell... Louann... Ingalls... Hampton Municipal Airport... Moro Bay... Weeks... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... Ellisville... Hilo... Harlow... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Ouachita
